sn12.43:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and ending of suffering.
sn12.43:4.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
sn12.43:5.1: “And what, mendicants, is the origin of suffering?
sn12.43:5.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn12.43:5.3: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.43:5.4: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.43:5.5: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.43:5.6: This is the origin of suffering.
sn12.43:6.1: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn12.43:6.2: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn12.43:6.3: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn12.43:6.4: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn12.43:6.5: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn12.43:6.6: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.43:6.7: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.43:6.8: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.43:6.9: This is the origin of suffering.
sn12.43:7.1: And what is the ending of suffering?
sn12.43:7.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn12.43:7.3: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.43:7.4: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.43:7.5: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.43:7.6: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn12.43:7.7: When grasping ceases, future existence ceases.
sn12.43:7.8: When future existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn12.43:7.9: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn12.43:7.10: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.43:7.11: This is the ending of suffering.
sn12.43:8.1: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn12.43:8.2: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn12.43:8.3: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn12.43:8.4: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn12.43:8.5: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn12.43:8.6: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.43:8.7: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.43:8.8: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.43:8.9: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn12.43:8.10: When grasping ceases, future existence ceases.
sn12.43:8.11: When future existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn12.43:8.12: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn12.43:8.13: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.43:8.14: This is the ending of suffering.”
